data.eml:eml: Macrophominavaccinii sp. nov. causing blueberry stem blight in China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhao, Lin, Cai, Jing, He, Wei, Zhang, Ying (2019): Macrophominavaccinii sp. nov. causing blueberry stem blight in China. MycoKeys 55: 1-14, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.55.35015, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.55.35015
